title: base64.URLEncoding is not URL-safe
body:
by **paul.a.bellamy**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Compile & run the attached program

What is the expected output?
_YA

What do you see instead?
_YA=

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
6g

Which operating system are you using?
Ubuntu 11.04

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
dac76f0b1a18 weekly/weekly.2011-06-16

Please provide any additional information below.
The '=' character is not URL-safe. So, it seems that when using base64.URLEncoding, the
encoded data should not be padded with '='.
Attachments: 1. main.go (576 bytes)
